title.text: Annotations and Tools for an Activity Based Spoken Language Corpus

introductionContent.text: The term "communicative management" refers to means whereby speakers can regulate interaction or their own communication.
There are three coding schemas related to communication management (cf. Allwood 2001): 1) Feedback coding, 2) Turn and sequence management coding, and 3) Own Communication Management (OCM) coding.
